description:
Many years ago, a Great Civil War ravaged Japan, leaving the country fragmented between two regions: Kansai and Kanto. In Kansai, a group of six Akudama carry out missions given to them by a mysterious black cat, while evading the police. But a dangerous journey is about to unfold when a civilian girl becomes twisted into the Akudama’s way of life and witnesses their criminal drives.

(Source: Funimation)

Note: On May 28, 2021, a director's cut of the final episode was released which included approximately 5 minutes of new content.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Crime
tags.description: Centers around unlawful activities punishable by the state or other authority.

tags.name: Cyberpunk
tags.description: Set in a future of advanced technological and scientific achievements that have resulted in social disorder.

tags.name: Fugitive
tags.description: Prominently features a character evading capture by an individual or organization.

tags.name: Dystopian
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a society characterized by poverty, squalor or oppression.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Prison
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a prison.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Artificial Intelligence
tags.description: Intelligent non-organic machines that work and react similarly to humans.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Motorcycles
tags.description: Prominently features the use of motorcycles.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Trains
tags.description: Prominently features trains.

tags.name: Virtual World
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the world inside a video game.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Space
tags.description: Partly or completely set in outer space.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

name.native: カンサイ会議最高幹部

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kazkodaka/)

A former employee of Spike Chunsoft and the co-founder of Too Kyo Games. He is primarily known for being the creator and scenario writer of the _Danganronpa_ video game series.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nk12) 

Writer of the script for Guilty Gear Xtra, the Guilty Gear novels and the drama CDs.

[Website](https://www.aidagon.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/foeget) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/foeget/) | [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/foeget/)

Shigekazu Aida is a musician and music producer from Tokyo.

[Profile](https://asahi-pro.co.jp/creator/yamada-kazuhiro)

Affiliated with Asahi Production.

_Note: Not to be confused with the other [composite artist](https://anilist.co/staff/252146/) by the same name._

Rui Komatsuzaki is best known as the main concept artist of the Danganronpa franchise.

Komatsuzaki was a sculpture graduate before becoming involved with Spike, and Danganronpa was his first experience as a character designer.

(Source: Danganronpa Wiki)

name.native: シンディ・H・ヤマウチ

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/49521465) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member_illust.php?id=8180930) | [Website](http://animestylepro.com/index.html)

Originating from Studio Musashi. She aspired to become an animator because of [Shingo Araki](https://anilist.co/staff/102613/).

She is fluent in English.

UraShimaSakataSen (浦島坂田船), or USSS for short, is a 4-unit utaites group consisting of [Uratanuki](https://anilist.co/staff/120293) (Green), [Shima](https://anilist.co/staff/147558) (Purple), [Sakata](https://anilist.co/staff/131139/) (Red) and [Senra](https://anilist.co/staff/160870) (Yellow). They've teamed up in 2013 and opened at least one live tour each year. They also have their own commercial items such as some merchandise. Also, they have a close relationship in real life.

In Spring 2017, USSS formed a fictional unit called "Fourpe" (フォープ Fōpu) under contract with NBCUniversal Entertainment Japan. In Fall 2019, the group received a short deformed animated comedy series, Days of Urashimasakatasen (浦島坂田船の日常 Urashimasakatasen no Nichijou).

(Source: Utaite Wiki)
